languages.text: "Я обязан исполнить приказ маршала, Вольный Торговец. Я вернусь на ваш корабль, как только обязательства перед Адептус Арбитес позволят".
"I must follow the Marshal's orders, Rogue Trader. I will return to your ship as soon as my duty to the Adeptus Arbites permits."
languages.original_text: "Я обязан исполнить приказ маршала, Вольный Торговец. Я вернусь на ваш корабль, как только обязательства перед Адептус Арбитес позволят".

traits.locale_text: "I must follow the Marshal's orders, Rogue Trader. I will return to your ship as soon as my duty to the Adeptus Arbites permits."
"I must follow the Marshal's orders, Rogue Trader. I will return to your ship as soon as my duty to the Adeptus Arbites permits."

"I must follow the Marshal's orders, Rogue Trader. I will return to your ship as soon as my duty to the Adeptus Arbites permits."

languages.text: "Ich muss die Befehle des Marschalls befolgen, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ich kehre auf Euer Schiff zurück, sobald es meine Pflicht gegenüber dem Adeptus Arbites zulässt."
languages.original_text: "I must follow the Marshal's orders, Rogue Trader. I will return to your ship as soon as my duty to the Adeptus Arbites permits."

traits.locale_text: "Ich muss die Befehle des Marschalls befolgen, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ich kehre auf Euer Schiff zurück, sobald es meine Pflicht gegenüber dem Adeptus Arbites zulässt."

languages.text: « Je dois obéir aux ordres du maréchal, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Je regagnerai votre vaisseau dès que mon devoir envers l'Adeptus Arbites me le permettra. »
languages.original_text: "I must follow the Marshal's orders, Rogue Trader. I will return to your ship as soon as my duty to the Adeptus Arbites permits."

traits.locale_text: « Je dois obéir aux ordres du maréchal, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Je regagnerai votre vaisseau dès que mon devoir envers l'Adeptus Arbites me le permettra. »

languages.text: “我必须服从元帅的命令，行商浪人。只要法务部那边的任务完成，我就会立刻回到你的旗舰上。”
languages.original_text: "I must follow the Marshal's orders, Rogue Trader. I will return to your ship as soon as my duty to the Adeptus Arbites permits."

traits.locale_text: “我必须服从元帅的命令，行商浪人。只要法务部那边的任务完成，我就会立刻回到你的旗舰上。”

languages.text: «Debo acatar las órdenes del Mariscal, Comerciante Independiente. Volveré a su nave en cuanto mi deber con el Adeptus Arbites lo permita».
languages.original_text: "I must follow the Marshal's orders, Rogue Trader. I will return to your ship as soon as my duty to the Adeptus Arbites permits."

traits.locale_text: «Debo acatar las órdenes del Mariscal, Comerciante Independiente. Volveré a su nave en cuanto mi deber con el Adeptus Arbites lo permita».

languages.text: 「ローグトレーダー、私は将帥の命令に従います。高等裁定局の義務が許され次第、あなたの船に戻ります」
languages.original_text: "I must follow the Marshal's orders, Rogue Trader. I will return to your ship as soon as my duty to the Adeptus Arbites permits."

traits.locale_text: 「ローグトレーダー、私は将帥の命令に従います。高等裁定局の義務が許され次第、あなたの船に戻ります」

languages.text: "Miralay'ın emirlerine uymak zorundayım Hür Tacir. Adeptus Arbites'e karşı vazifem müsaade eder etmez geminize döneceğim."
languages.original_text: "I must follow the Marshal's orders, Rogue Trader. I will return to your ship as soon as my duty to the Adeptus Arbites permits."

traits.locale_text: "Miralay'ın emirlerine uymak zorundayım Hür Tacir. Adeptus Arbites'e karşı vazifem müsaade eder etmez geminize döneceğim."
